New Records: Dasun Shanaka hit the fastest fifty by a Sri Lankan batsman in T20 format (20 balls)
Key Match Events: Sri Lanka won the match by 16 runs
Shanaka took two wickets in the 20th over
Axar Patel and Suryakumar Yadav formed a 91-run sixth-wicket stand
Post-Match Reflections: Shanaka praised his team's defense of the total
Hardik Pandya acknowledged the difficulty of the situation and the crime of bowling no-balls
Miscellaneous Highlights: Arshdeep Singh bowled five of the seven no-balls in the innings
Left-arm quick Umran Malik took two wickets
